Html:
I am using nuget to get the prism libraries,
I do the same to get the blend sdk libraries.
But I get into problems and get the following error :
Error 2 The type 'InteractionRequestTrigger' from assembly 'Microsoft.Practices.Prism.Interactivity' is built with an older version of the Blend SDK, and is not supported in a Windows Presentation Framework 4 project.

Does this not mean that the nuget package of prism5 should be updated using the latest version of the blend SDK ?
Or should I try to find the right version of the blend sdk libraries myself ?
Or should I build all the prism libraries myself using the latest blend sdk ?

stuyckp,

What version of Blend are you using and can you provide a link to where you go it? I want to check to ensure we are using the same binaries. Then I can compare it to the version we tested against.

Thanks.

Blaine Wastell

Stuyckp,

If you use the "Expression.Blend.Sdk" version 1.0.2 nuget package, that should get you the right version of the Blend SDK.

Thanks,
-Francis
